title: Substitute for FF Din
content:
Hello all,

Working with Illustrator and wondering if there is a suitable substitute for FF Din. Anything close enough that you'd recommend?

Thanks.
author: aehernandez

comments.content: Of course it depends on the job at hand...
Business cards, lots of negative space...
Might I suggest an early graduate from the Typophile critique boards: [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082958/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Pill%20Gothic)?
Maybe [Gravur Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082958/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Gravur+Condensed/) too, if it may be rounded.

Or perhaps just a more stylish DIN?

[http://www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&FontStyleID=&FontFamilyID=14...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123082958/http:/www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&FontStyleID=&FontFamilyID=14&CharacterSetID=34 "http://www.parachute.gr/fonts.aspx?Sample=1&FontStyleID=&FontFamilyID=14&CharacterSetID=34")
